allow: Bash(python3 -c " import json, sys line = sys.stdin.read\(\) data = json.loads\(line\) content = data[''message''][''content''] # Find the JSON part starting from the first { start = content.index\(''{''\) # Find matching closing brace depth = 0 end = start for i in range\(start, len\(content\)\): if content[i] == ''{'': depth += 1 elif content[i] == ''}'': depth -= 1 if depth == 0: end = i + 1 break json_str = content[start:end] parsed = json.loads\(json_str\) print\(json.dumps\(parsed, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False\)\) " 2)

statusLine.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$j = [Console]::In.ReadToEnd() | ConvertFrom-Json; $parts = @(); $d = $j.workspace.current_dir -replace '^C:/_git/', ''; if($d){$parts += $d}; if($j.model.display_name){$parts += $j.model.display_name}; if($j.output_style.name){$parts += $j.output_style.name}; if($j.context_window.used_percentage -ne $null){$u=[math]::Round($j.context_window.used_percentage,0); $r=[math]::Round($j.context_window.remaining_percentage,0); $parts += 'ctx:' + $u + '%/' + $r + '%'}; if($j.cost.total_cost_usd -ne $null){$parts += 'USD ' + [string][math]::Round($j.cost.total_cost_usd,2)}; if($j.vim.mode){$parts += $j.vim.mode}; Write-Host ($parts -join ' | ') -NoNewline"
